SUGGESTION_FORM.TITLE: Submit Your Suggestion
SUGGESTION_FORM.DESCRIPTION: Your well-being matters to us. If you have ideas or suggestions on how we can improve our support and resources, please share them here. Your feedback helps us create a better experience and more effective resources for everyone. All suggestions are anonymous.
